author: dblevins
msg: Extremely rough and barely useful OpenEJB-Tomcat documentation, but it's a start.
It was hacked together from pieces of the Local Server doc and the Remote Server doc, there is actually no Tomcat specific information and the examples are not very specific.
It's more or less a template.

author: dblevins
msg: Fixed bug in the getFile method.
It was attempting to resolve absolute paths as relative paths.
This happens if you use the constructor File( path1 , path2 )
You cannot use this constructor if path2 is an absolute path,
the result will be two absolute paths simply concatenated together.
This is clearly something in the  java.io.File object and is a
bug in the java.io.File API.

author: dblevins
msg: ADDED: paths resolved relative to OPENEJB_HOME
The config factory will now also resolve those paths
relative to the OPENEJB_HOME directory.  If your
OPENEJB_HOME variable was set to C:\openejb, for
example, the following line...
<Deployments dir="beans/" />
...would automatically be expanded to...
<Deployments dir="C:\openejb\beans\" />

author: dblevins
msg: Added new messages for the -m deploy option

author: dblevins
msg: Added another getFile method that can bypass strict validation of whether the file is present, etc.
